pages.text: 26|20|Ta shuo:“Dangri, wo bu dongshi di ganle na jian shi.
26|21|Wo jiu weiju nimen, er taobi nimen, suihou, wo de zhu ba zhihui shangci wo, bingqie paiqian wo wei shizhe,
26|22|ni zebei wo wang'en, ni suowei de en shi ni ceng nuyi yiselie de houyi.”
26|23|Falao shuo:“Zhong shijie de zhu shi shenme?”
26|24|Ta shuo:“Ta shi tiandi wanwu de zhu, ruguo nimen shi quexin zhe.”
26|25|Falao dui ta zuoyou de ren shuo:“Nimen zenme bu qingting ne?”
26|26|Ta shuo:“(Ta shi) nimen de zhu, yeshi nimen zuxian de zhu.”
26|27|Falao shuo:“Fengming lai jiaohua nimen de zhe wei shizhe, que shi yige fengzi.”
26|28|Ta shuo:“(Ta shi) dongfang he xifang, yiji jie hu dongxi zhi jian de zhu, ruguo nimen neng liaojie.”
26|29|Falao shuo:“Ruguo ni she wo er jing shi bie de shenling, wo shibi shi ni bian cheng yige qiufan.”
26|30|Ta shuo:“Yaoshi wo zhaoshi ni yige mingzheng ne?”
26|31|Falao shuo:“Ruguo ni shi shuo shihua de, ni jiu zhaoshi yige mingzheng ba!”
26|32|Ta jiu reng xia ta de shouzhang, na tiao shouzhang huran bian cheng yitiao mang;
26|33|ta ba ta de shou chou chulai, na zhi shou zai guanzhong de yanqian huran xiande bailiang liang de.
26|34|Falao dui ta de zuoyou de guizumen shuo:“Zhe que shi yige gaoming de shushi,
26|35|ta xiang ping ta de moshu, ba nimen zhu chu guojing, nimen you she me jianyi ne?”
26|36|Tamen shuo:“Qing ni kuanxian ta he ta di gege, bing pai zhengmu yuan dao ge chengshi qu,
26|37|tamen hui ba suoyou gaoming de shushi dou zhao dao ni zheli lai.”
26|38|Shushimen zai zhiding de riqi, yi zhiding de shijian jihe qilai.
26|39|Youren dui minzhong shuo:“Nimen jihe qilaile ma?
